data.author: Spencer Johnson

changelog.release_notes: Initial Release of the Pebble Time version.

There was an issue that I found where it would crash if every day was a split day. I fixed this by just making Yesterday always a ?
I know it breaks the look, but now it should work again finally.

Fixed the crashing issues
Had to removed the Invert Color and TV Color Options
Fixed crashing issues with iOS and Android. Word is now adjusted to the left, as 2.1.1 broke it.
Fixed crashing issues with Android and iOS. If crashing persists, do a factory reset and reinstall app. If problem still persists, email me through the email the developer option.

Implemented a Settings file that now allows users to choose a new colorscheme, invert the DTDT trigger axis, display the temperature (fahrenheit), or use celsius (need temperature to be displayed as well), and invert the watchface (looks really nice with the new TV Colorscheme).

data.description:
Inspired by the HUD used in Persona 4, this watchface is a labor of love-style tribute that also provides real world functionality.
Featuring: 12/24 hr time, hourly weather updates via geo location, Animated 3 day forecast displaying the day's morning & evening weather (forecast can be triggered by Y or Z axis acceleration), & persistent storage of current weather forecast.  for Android & iOS

latest_release.release_notes:

data.title: Persona 4: THE GOLDEN
